# Lentando (private habit + substance tracker)
- App: https://lentando.3d2k.com/
- Privacy: https://lentando.3d2k.com/privacy.html
- Terms: https://lentando.3d2k.com/terms.html
- Source: https://github.com/KilledByAPixel/Lentando
- Key points: local-first, no ads/tracking, optional sync, export/delete anytime
